title: San Diego/Mid-City
name: The Big Kitchen
directions: at Grape and Fern in South Park, southeast of Balboa Park; to get there from North Park, travel south on 30th Street (which will become Fern Street) until you get to Grape Street
content: This restaurant is so named because the kitchen is bigger than the rest of the restaurant.  "Judy The Beauty (on Duty)" is usually there serving up great food (mainly breakfast, but also lunch), with a cheerful attitude. Take time to appreciate the bumper stickers and celebrity posters on the walls - Whoopi Goldberg once worked here.
